line: Subject, pick up the book.
Hypothesis: subject does not know what a "book" is.
note: After player fails to pick up book for a time since last line played

line: Subject, remove the rectangular object from the nearby pillar.
note: After player fails to pick up book for a time since last line played

line: Updated hypothesis: subject does not know what a "pillar" is.
note: After player fails to pick up book for a time since last line played

line: Very good. Now place the book on one of the nearby pillars.
Subject appears to have issues with corporeality. Note: apply mild adhesive to future testing equipment.
Subject has chosen the RED pillar. Results: unsatisfactory.
Subject has chosen the BLUE pillar. Results: unsatisfactory.
Subject has chosen the GREEN pillar. Results: unsatisfactory.
Subject has attempted to return the book to a bookshelf. Hypothesis: subject retains basic level of mental association.
Subject demonstrates lack of understanding in local thermodynamics. Suggestion: further reading.
Subject has re-chosen initial placement. Results: satisfactory.
note: Player puts book back where it was picked up

line: Subject has chosen the GOLDEN pillar. Results: extremely satisfactory.
note: Player puts book on gold pillar

line: Subject has chosen unexpected pillar. Results: additional testing needed.
note: Player puts book on any tall pillar

line: Experiment failed. Suggestion: administer high-level behavioral correction to subject.
Subject has defied all theoretical expectations. Results: unknown.
note: Player somehow manages to place the book somewhere actually unexpected

line: Take the experimental device.
Come on, just walk into it and it'll bind to your form.
note: After player fails to pick up launcher for a time since last line played

line: The launcher, Moira! Take the launcher!
note: After player fails to pick up launcher for a time since last line played

line: Subject is showing resistance to the experience. New protocol: ignore the subject until directions are obeyed.
note: After player fails to pick up launcher for a time since last line played

line: Next, operate the mechanism until results are obtained.
Hypothesis: Moira is making an admirable attempt to educate the Spirit Fish.
Moira shows aggressive behavior. Note: administer reward.
Data collection in progress...
Results presently unclear. More data needed.
The data is accumulating!
More! More!
Enough data collected. Come, let's de-graft that thing from you.
These are some serums I'm developing. Imbibe them so I may observe their effects.
Pick one and use it!
note: Player doesn't consume serums for a time

line: The serums, Moira! You must use more serums!
note: Player doesn't consume serums for a time

line: The data will be incomplete unless you take them all. The data must be completed.
note: Player doesn't consume serums for a time

line: You will not leave this place until all serums are consumed.
note: Player doesn't consume serums for a time, loops back from A

line: Effect unclear. Hypothesis: more serums must be absorbed.
The subject is staring intently down. Hypothesis: subject is hallucinating.
Subject appears to be in intense pain. Serum rated as highly effective.
No effect observed. Control serum functional.
Subject is unsteady. Note: stronger variant may work as a sedative.
Paranoia levels in the subject appear to have spiked.
Note: when conducting further studies, tag the bookshelves to see where they just went.
Very well, Moira. Experiment completed. Further serums must be synthesized for future studies.
Observation in progress. Subject expected to exhibit curiosity.
The SUBJECT is expected to exhibit CURIOSITY!
note: Player does nothing for a time

line: Subject! Interact with the experimental equipment!
note: Player does nothing for a time

line: Subject is acting with petty resistence. Note: punish the subject once the experiment is concluded.
note: Player does nothing for a time

line: Interesting! The books!
Enough books! Use some serums!
Subject! Stop moving the books! The serums, subject!
Yes! I've refined the serum formulas! Test them all!
More serums! More!
Note: the serums are acting as expected. Suggestion: further testing of serums.
Oh no...
Very good, subject. Stay here.
note: Time passes after player drinks serum 7

line: Subject, please stop looking at the gap between pillars.
note: Time passes after player drinks serum 7

line: Subject...
note: Time passes after player drinks serum 8

line: Subject! Come back!
note: Player walks a distance from the center

line: Please don't leave, subject!
note: Player walks a distance from the center

line: Please, subject... Moira...
note: Player walks a distance from the center
